Package com.microsoft.azure.v3.credentials

Class AzureTokenCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.v3.credentials.AzureTokenCredentials
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncServiceClientCredentials
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationTokenCredentials, AzureCliCredentials, DelegatedTokenCredentials, MSICredentials, UserTokenCredentials
    public abstract class AzureTokenCredentials
extends java.lang.Object
implements AsyncServiceClientCredentials
    AzureTokenCredentials represents a credentials object with access to Azure Resource management.
